task.title: Remapping your Print Screen Button
task.shortdesc: You can change the button used for printing your screen.

taskbody.context: You can choose which button prints your screen. By default Snagit does not associate any button with this function.

step.cmd: Press the key you want to map.

taskbody.result: After completing these steps you will have remapped the button Snagit uses to print your screen.
